Determines if the animal can move to the new coordinate.

Determines if the user can move to the specified coordinate.
canMove(Coordinate) - Method in interface Movable
Determines if the entity can move to the specified coordinate.
checkRange(int, Coordinate) - Method in interface Movable
Return a list of coordinates that fall into the radius (range) of the specified coordinate.

collect(Coordinate) - Method in class User
Collects an entity from the specified coordinate.
Collectable - Interface in researchsim.util
Denotes an entity that can be collected by the User in the simulation.
CollectEvent - Class in researchsim.logging
The collection of an entity that implemented Collectable by a User.
CollectEvent(User, Entity) - Constructor for class CollectEvent
Creates a new collect event, this is an event where a user collects research on an entity.
convert(int, int) - Static method in class Coordinate
Utility method to convert an (x,y) integer pair to an array index location.
Coordinate - Class in researchsim.map
A coordinate is a representation of the X and Y positions on a graphical map.
This X, Y position can be used to calculate the index of a Tile in the scenario tile map depending on the currently active scenario.
Coordinate() - Constructor for class Coordinate
Creates a new coordinate at the top left position (0,0), index 0 (zero).
Coordinate(int) - Constructor for class Coordinate
Creates a new coordinate at the specified index.
Coordinate(int, int) - Constructor for class Coordinate
Creates a new coordinate at the specified (x,y) position.
CoordinateOutOfBoundsException - Exception in researchsim.util
Exception thrown when the program attempts to access a Tile using an invalid Coordinate / index.
CoordinateOutOfBoundsException() - Constructor for exception CoordinateOutOfBoundsException
Constructs a CoordinateOutOfBoundsException with no detail message.
CoordinateOutOfBoundsException(String) - Constructor for exception CoordinateOutOfBoundsException
Constructs a CoordinateOutOfBoundsException that contains a helpful detail message explaining why the exception occurred.
CoordinateOutOfBoundsException(String, Throwable) - Constructor for exception CoordinateOutOfBoundsException
Constructs a CoordinateOutOfBoundsException that contains a helpful detail message explaining why the exception occurred and the underlying cause of the exception.
CoordinateOutOfBoundsException(Throwable) - Constructor for exception CoordinateOutOfBoundsException
Constructs a CoordinateOutOfBoundsException that stores the underlying cause of the exception.
createErrorDialog(String, String) - Method in class ViewModel
Creates and shows an error dialog.
createSuccessDialog(String, String) - Method in class ViewModel
Creates and shows a success dialog.
